actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an increased investment tax credit for the conversion or replacement of equipment which uses natural gas or oil.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the investment tax credit to 20 percent for the replacement of equipment which is fueled by natural gas or oil with equipment which burns other fuels.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an increased investment tax credit for the conversion or replacement of equipment which uses natural gas or oil.
